Projects.title: Invervyou AI
desc: AI Based interview Preparation Website created to help fresh graduates and job seekers prepare for interviews and optimize their CV through AI-powered features. The website is built using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, Prisma, and MySQL (TiDB).

The website has a few features such as a dashboard for the user to see their interview preparation progress, a CV analysis and optimization feature, and a few AI-powered interview questions that can be answered by the user which will be analyzed by the AI to provide feedback. The analysis contains the answer analysis, the gesture analysis, and a material recommendation to improve the user's performance.

The website also has a token mechanism that allows the user to purchase tokens to access the AI-powered features. Integrated with Indonesian payment gateway (Midtrans) to allow users to purchase tokens easily.
